amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part B of House Report 117-9 to clarify that felony convictions do not bar any eligible individual from voting in federal elections, including individuals who are currently incarcerated.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to clarify that felony convictions do not bar any eligible individual from voting in federal elections, including individuals who are currently incarcerated.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bush amendment (A004) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 97 - 328 (Roll no. 53).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A004) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bush amendment (A004) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 97 - 328 (Roll no. 53).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Bush.
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Bush amendment (A004) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 97 - 328 (Roll no. 53).
